headline: Borderlands Mexico: Mexican government aims to regulate Asian e-commerce imports
summary: This week in Borderlands: Mexican government aims to regulate Asian e-commerce imports; Emerson Electric plans $22.5M factory in Chihuahua; Chinese firm plans $20M machinery factory in Mexico; and Investment firm constructing logistics center in Laredo, Texas. The post Borderlands Mexico: Mexican government aims to regulate Asian e-commerce imports appeared first on FreightWaves.
